description._content: Image taken from: Title: "Tourists' Companion to West Cornwall and the Scilly Isles. Edited by E. W. Crofts ... Illustrated by R. Paterson, R. Murray, &c. Containing contributions by Mr. Thomas Cornish, Rev. W. S. Lach-Szyrma [and others], etc" Author: CROFTS, E. Whitfield. Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10347.cc.13.(2.)" Page: 37 Place of Publishing: London Date of Publishing: 1887 Publisher: Elliot Stock Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000822125 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
